article_title: Health Insurers Call for Stronger Rules on Medical Devices
article_text:
The U.S. health-insurance industry is calling for tougher rules for approving and tracking medical devices, citing regulatory gaps exposed last year when a tool used for decades in hysterectomies was found to spread cancer.

America’s Health Insurance Plans, a trade group, said in a letter to Sen. Bob Casey on Tuesday that the dangers of the laparoscopic power morcellator reveal weaknesses in how devices are cleared for use and...
